full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

* **Title**: 39903-230484 Water Purification System
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3741587119
* **Publication Date**: 31 May 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: 10 August 2023 at 14:00 EDT
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity**: Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA)

**Background and Requirements**
Pursuant to Amendment 4, a request for Standing Offer for water purification systems on an as-needed basis is being solicited. The tender seeks a supplier to provide, deliver, and install water purification systems for the Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA).

**Specifications**

* The system must meet the requirements outlined in the tender documents.
* The supplier must provide evidence of past experience in delivering similar water purification systems.
* The chosen supplier will be required to provide installation, maintenance, and support services.

**Contract Details**

* Contract Start Date: None
* Contract End Date: 30 June 2024
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Trade Agreements**
This tender is subject to the trade agreements listed below:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

**Contact Information**

Contact Richard Tea (SPAC/PSPC) at richard.tea@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for any questions or concerns related to this tender.

**Method of Procurement**
This tender will be conducted through an invitation to tender, where the lowest price will be the decision-making criterion.

Retrieve more information about this tender by visiting the Ariba Discovery website at https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16449290.
